content: संकरः {@--1@} Commingling, mixture, intermixture; पत्रसंकर <ls>Ś. 2.</ls> {@--2@} Blending together, union. {@--3@} Confusion or mixture (of castes), unlawful intermarriage resulting in mixed castes; चित्रेषु वर्णसंकरः <ls>K.</ls>; संकरो नरकायैव कुलघ्नानां कुलस्य च <ls>Bg. 1. 42</ls>; <ls>Ms. 10. 40.</ls> {@--4@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) The combination of two or more {%dependent%} figures of speech in one and the same passage (<ab>opp.</ab> संसृष्टि where the figures are {%independent%}); अविश्रांतिजुषामात्मन्यंगांगित्वे तु सकरः <ls>K. P. 10</ls>; or अंगागित्वेऽ लंकृतीनां तद्वदेकाश्रयस्थितौ . संदिग्धत्वे च भवति संकरस्त्रिविधः पुनः <ls>S. D. 757.</ls> {@--5@} The crackling of flames. {@--6@} Dust, sweepings.
